text: Abyssocomitas is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Abyssocomitas include: * Abyssocomitas kurilokamchatica Sysoev & Kantor, 1986 ==References== ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Abyssocomitas
